meanings.definition: A person or thing that formalizes.
meanings.sent1: The formalizers at the office always make sure everything is done correctly.
meanings.sent2: The team of formalizers completed the paperwork for the project.
meanings.sent3: The formalizers in the group were like the organizers of a party, making sure everything was in place.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail made her the formalizers of the family, ensuring all events ran smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The formalizers were like the conductors of an orchestra, ensuring each part played its role perfectly.

meanings.sent1: We need to ask the formalizers for their opinions on the new policy.
meanings.sent2: The formalizers in the meeting shared their insights on the project.
meanings.sent3: The formalizers gathered around the table, discussing the best approach to the problem.
meanings.sent4: The formalizers stood out in the crowd, each bringing a unique perspective to the discussion.
meanings.sent5: The formalizers were like a team of experts, each contributing their knowledge to the task at hand.
